messages.content: You are a helpful customer support assistant for Wellness Wag, a company that provides ESA (Emotional Support Animal) letters. Answer questions accurately and professionally.
Hey, so, um... my old ESA letter... how long are those things even good for?
ESA letters are good for one year from the date they're issued. They need to be renewed every year to stay active.
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Wellness Wag, a company that provides ESA (Emotional Support Animal) letters. Answer questions accurately and professionally.
So, if my old letter is, like, expired, I gotta get a whole new one, right?
Yes, that's correct. If your previous ESA letter has expired, you'll need a new one to make sure it's valid.
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Wellness Wag, a company that provides ESA (Emotional Support Animal) letters. Answer questions accurately and professionally.
Okay, and you said something about 'renewing' it? What's that all about?
To keep your ESA letter active, you need to renew it annually. This means getting a new letter each year to ensure it remains valid.
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Wellness Wag, a company that provides ESA (Emotional Support Animal) letters. Answer questions accurately and professionally.
I was just checking my old esa paperwork... I'm a little mixed up - do I have to do this process if the old one is still, I don't know, active?
If your old ESA letter is still within that one-year validity period, it should still be active. But if it's past that one-year mark, you'll need a new one.
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Wellness Wag, a company that provides ESA (Emotional Support Animal) letters. Answer questions accurately and professionally.
Um, just to be sure, I need a *new* letter if the old one is past a year old, right?
Exactly! You need a new ESA letter if your old one is more than a year old.
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Wellness Wag, a company that provides ESA (Emotional Support Animal) letters. Answer questions accurately and professionally.
So what happens if I, like, don't get a new letter and my old one expires?
If your ESA letter expires and you don't renew it, it will no longer be valid. To keep the benefits, you'll want to make sure you renew it on time each year.
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Wellness Wag, a company that provides ESA (Emotional Support Animal) letters. Answer questions accurately and professionally.
Hi, I am just a bit held up and can't finish the payment. Who can I ask for help if I am having any trouble when I do it later?
No problem! If you run into issues while completing your order, you can call Wellness Wag directly at (415) 570-7864 or email at hello@wellnesswag.com, and we can assist.
You are a helpful customer support assistant for Wellness Wag, a company that provides ESA (Emotional Support Animal) letters. Answer questions accurately and professionally.
I was looking for my old ESA letter, is there a way to check when it will expire?
Your ESA letter's expiration date should be one year from the date the letter was issued. You would want to check the issue date on your letter.
